Package com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2

Interface TextBox.TextBoxRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentRenderer<TextBox>, InteractableRenderer<TextBox>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextBox.DefaultTextBoxRenderer
    Enclosing class:
    TextBox

    public static interface TextBox.TextBoxRenderer
extends InteractableRenderer<TextBox>
    Helper interface that doesn't add any new methods but makes coding new text box renderers a little bit more clear
